name: data.webuild.sg
description: using data and graphs to inspire variety, openness and projects for the design and engineering community in Singapore

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:graph && npm run build:js
scripts.clean: rm index.html && rm -rf dataset  && rm -rf public/data
scripts.status: notes graphs tasks test views && npm outdated
scripts.test: jshint graphs tasks test public/js && standard tasks/**/*.js graphs/**/*.js public/**/*.js && NODE_ENV=test mocha test --recursive && jsinspect ./tasks ./graphs -t 30 -i
scripts.update: git pull && npm run build && npm run check && npm t && npm start
